website_summaries.verdict: A good saucer chair to choose for different, unique print options that stand out.
pros: Chair folds up for easy transportation and storage when not in use
Available patterns come in many different colors including purple, teal, and zebra
cons: The fabric on the seat is likely to rip after a year or so of consistent use

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: it’s cute but I wouldn’t say it was worth the price - the cushion isn’t very think and it’s basically a folding chair - this one is a kid size- not for adults
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kapadia

customer_reviews.title: Badly damaged package inside out...  which was returned and resent to us !!!
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY disappointed... The package was delivered on time but the package was crushed on the top, sides and resealed. It actually looked like it was returned and you sent it to us. Plus inside had no paper work and the white chair wasn't even in a plastic bag. Now this was a gift for my grand daughter and I'm embarrassed to give it to her for her 11th Birthday... POP POP Mr. Schmitz I can text or email pictures...
customer_reviews.author: Bob Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: The most amazing chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this chair! It’s so soft, comfortable and with my back pain it’s hard finding any chair comfortable but this one is amazing. I bought a Sherpa pillow to go with it and it made it even better! I recommend this chair 100% because even if you may be young or old, hurting or fine, this chair just works for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Chair is small and lower to the ground than others ...
customer_reviews.text: Chair is small and lower to the ground than others. Possibly ok for a child...It arrived in a box with one tag on it and no protective wrapping except the box it was sent in which is not ideal. Product should have had some plastic cover on it to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: glowbug2

customer_reviews.title: It isn’t a gold frame
customer_reviews.text: Its cute and I, a large adult, can sit in it comfortably. However the base is NOT in any way a good color. It’s brown/blush. They even advertise gold pillows to go with this chair but there’s no gold on it. What in the world.
customer_reviews.author: lc's mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Very cute little chair. My daughter loves it! Perfect size for a bedroom. It's very, very soft too. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it came with a big dirt spot on the fabric from shipping. However, I was able to use some upholstery cleaner on it and it took the spot right out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color on frame had to spray paint still comfy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair because it was affordable, and comfortable, which yes it is very comfortable. BUT it is definitely NOT GOLD on the frame it’s brown the exact same color as the card board box it came in, which I’m very upset about because the gold color is the only reason I bought the chair and could’ve gotten a cheaper one and spray painted like I had to do with this one
customer_reviews.author: C Merritt P

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This was a huge hit for my daughter’s room. It’s perfect for her reading nook. She sits in it for hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: S-Luf

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: We returned this almost right away. Even though my smaller than average 14 year old could fit on this, it was just way too small and did not seem sturdy at all. Also the color on the metal is a brown/tan color not gold at all. Overall the construction of this is pretty poor and I don’t recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: jcourt

customer_reviews.title: Overall too small and returned it
customer_reviews.text: The chair was soft and cute to look at it but once my daughter (10 yrs and very tall and thin) sat in it, we quickly realized it was just too small. I would say this chair is better suited for a toddler or young child. She wanted a chair to curl up in and read but this isn't the one. It works fine for sitting upright but that's it. As an adult I also felt like it was too low to the ground, but we are in the taller side
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this classy chair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! I had tried to buy it through Wally World thinking Amazon I can quit you ( but I can‘t !) and that was a nightmare. So Uncle Jeff to the rescue once again with this fabulous chair. Being solid muscle ;) I am somewhat heavy, but I fit in the chair just fine and can even curl up in it.
customer_reviews.author: Crackle

customer_reviews.title: Frame is NOT gold...its light brown
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair specifically because the frame was GOLD The frame is brown like a light chocolate It is adult size Seems sturdy The back or underside of the fur is a thin canvas No fur on back side of the seat That makes it look cheap from the back It's not thickly padded but it is sufficient Kind of disappointed in the overall look and feel But it is sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for my daughter and soon after my son wanted one, too! They seem to like them and lounge in them while reading and hanging out. I personally don’t think they are worth 40$ but my kids are happy so I’m not complaining!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: It’s so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’m getting my room painted white and gold so this is perfect also as many reviews might have mentioned this,the gold is a musteredish color. Box did come a little open but five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome white chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and durable. I just love this chair very happy I bought it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves her chair. Very sturdy. Light weight
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Koski

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter because she’s going off to college and needed a chair it’s cute I actually told her I wish I ordered me one too. Just ordered another one so now she will have 2 in her dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: melody pait

customer_reviews.title: The chair is pink and white!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair comes with PINK LEGS!!!! I did not like this feature and I am returning it immediately. The website description is wrong as it looks like the legs of this chair are gold when they are not. I am redoing my bedroom and I was hoping to finally get it finished with the chair but no. I have to return this chair and find another one. Do not buy this chair unless you want a crappy looking chair that I would probably only take camping.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Davies

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was cheap. The chair is smaller than advertised. The metal bars weren’t gold, not even close. I got it for my step daughter for Christmas and I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Compact, sturdy reading chair for a tween.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size chair for a 9 year old's room. Frame is *not* gold, but actually brown. Seat is very thinly padded, so you definitely feel the bar in front when sitting in it. Feels sturdy. Despite these concerns, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hot-tomato

customer_reviews.title: Frame is built to last and can hold weight fabric is thin and is faux fur
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this chair is it fits in a small space in my bedroom. Looks very cute (I'm 64) It sits low so I have to push myself up & out of the chair. A pillow would solve that. Great value and looks and feels like it can last. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Peridotbabie

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is complete garbage. It arrived in a totally collapsed and damage box. After taking it out of the box we discovered that the locking mechanism did not work. Upon reaching out to customer service they informed me that I would need to go out and purchase a box to return the item or else they could not refund it. They said they would only give 50% credit after pay over 100 dollars for the item. Horrible item and terrible customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: False Website Description
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this since she was redoing her room in a white / gold color theme. What a mistake!! This is NOT GOLD AT ALL. They are misleading people with false descriptions- if anything it’s a very ugly faded copper. Please do not buy this...it’s now such a pain to return !!!
customer_reviews.author: Radhika Sinha

customer_reviews.title: Some Minor Improvements
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's very fuzzy but cheap material, it's small, it isn't that comfortable. We don't want you to feel bad. This is my daughter giving the review but overall, I'd rate this a 4.5. But I wish there is different types of sizes so we can get the right size for everyone. It is a bit flat for the fuzziness too. I wish it could pop out more and have more cushion inside of the fuzz. I hope you don't take this to your offense!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kao

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Christmas gift this year, so we've only had it for a week. My daughter loves it! Came assembled. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: kw900bear

customer_reviews.title: Legs are not gold as described or pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Disregard picture with the gold legs and the use of the word "gold" in the description/choice of colors. Other than that being very misleading, chair was accurately represented in the picture that showed mauve-ish legs. Still a good bargain and daughter is happy, but I may have looked further for something truly gold (or silver for that matter) had I known.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Horton

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 y/o and she loves it. She couldn’t be more happy to have it in her room.
customer_reviews.author: The beard of knowledge

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: How about this chair for my living room as a decoration. It was very comfy and a little short comfortable. I liked it
customer_reviews.author: Latanya Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Legs were not gold as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The chair is pretty much what my 11 yo daughter wanted for her room. It was white which we were expecting. However, I had a choice of ordering silver legs or gold legs and I ordered gold. However, they are not even close to gold, they are an UGLY brown. Definitely not as advertised so that’s disappointing. No worth trying to return.
customer_reviews.author: Connie H.

customer_reviews.title: This crap
customer_reviews.text: I don’t liked , it’s a lot of money for this chair, this crap.
customer_reviews.author: sandra rivera

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality it hurts my legs when I sit on it. I have to have a blanket in order to sit on this faux fur chair....really small and cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely meant for a kid
customer_reviews.text: Chair is simply ok. Fits my need but I do warn that it is rather small and NOT meant for an adult. Excellent chair for kids. I am keeping because it fits my very small apartment and I am 5’1” and 105 lbs. I JUST fit in the chair comfortable to sit. If you don’t mind small or it’s for a child it’s definitely worth it but otherwise don’t bother.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair for my son very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: victor colin

customer_reviews.title: Looks Cheap/Arrived Stained
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my niece. The Chair itself is ok, it looks a little cheap. The metal bars are not really gold it's more of a bright brown. However, the back of the chair came all stained with what looks like dirt or something. I only opened the package on the day that I was supposed to give it as a gift. If you order this I would check it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, portable, but not at all comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This chair looks nice in the room but really isn’t comfortable in any way. It might be comfortable for a child or a small pet? However it doesn’t take up much space and is very portable which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: PieknaPiecyk

customer_reviews.title: very soft and comfy chair
customer_reviews.text: this chair is in my room and i was impressed by how soft and comfy it is
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but a bit pricy
customer_reviews.text: In general it is sturdy but think it’s a little pricy
customer_reviews.author: APPLE LUO

customer_reviews.title: SUPER comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: PRO: SUPER comfortable and cute. CONS: There was a light spot on the fabric, however I was planning to put a throw on the chair so You can't tell anyway. The "gold" frame isn't gold, it's just ochre.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this is the perfect chair! i’m an adult and can sit very comfortably in this chair! def recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The description says White and Gold this chair is far from Gold its tan brown at best nowhere near gold
customer_reviews.author: Doneca

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, just not as big as I thought it would be. Very comfy though!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa O’Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Cozy and plush
customer_reviews.text: The chair materials are of goods quality. It was a little smaller than anticipated but the measurements were given so I can’t complain. Fits perfect in our nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The package came all damaged and the chair was dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters' bedroom. Was sturdy enough to hold me too!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy chair. Great size. Bought it for my daughters room and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not super comfy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is cute however not super comfy. The padding is not quite plush enough to support weight very well. You can feel the bar underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Added perfect finish to 11 year old’s room
customer_reviews.text: This chair is adorable. My 11 year old daughter absolutely loves it. She added a blue fluffy pillow for added pop and it completely finishes her room off. Great price and perfect chair for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: The material looks cheap but it’s actually really soft and cozy!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Lily Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, fits perfect in my daughters room under her loft
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Fluffiness and quality
customer_reviews.text: It's not as fluffy as it looks in the picture. The quality is "alright" a bit cheap for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair! Very soft and looks great in my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Cute but noisy
customer_reviews.text: Makes squeaky noises every time you sit on it....cover rubbing on metal frame I believe. Cute and good value.
customer_reviews.author: susan sokoloff

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging!
customer_reviews.text: This came in a dirty box all torn up. This is a white fur chair and was not even wrapped in plastic! Looks dingy and I am not happy.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: The chair is not the exact one pictured, similar but NOT the same. The one I received looks cheaper, not as furry. It is Ok, but disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lizz L.

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: DA BEST PRODUCT IN AMAZONNNN I EVER GOT IN MAH LIFE IM IN ♡ WITH DIS
customer_reviews.author: Yujin Lee

customer_reviews.title: It's a really decent size.
customer_reviews.text: It's so comfy and soft! I love it so much more than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Got this mostly for decoration. It’s kinda small so it may be better for a child’s room but it’s cute.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Knight

customer_reviews.title: Legs are not gold
customer_reviews.text: The legs look more brown than gold. It didnt look as nice in person so we shipped it back;(
customer_reviews.author: CFran

customer_reviews.title: Fluffy chair for small room
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted . "FLUFFY" chair...but her room is small. This was a good size for a small room.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: it’s perfect for a bedroom chair, it’s comfy and there’s no need to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Plaza

customer_reviews.title: chair arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: the chair arrived with a small whole in the side of the cushion and a black smug on the white cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Curvymodelkimberlyd

customer_reviews.title: The metal is not Gold
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it to be Gold Merle but instead it’s a grayish, purple color that looks very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s super comfortable ! I really liked it, it’s kinda low, but still super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: very soft, it’s exactly like the picture and is already made when u get it
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Cote

customer_reviews.title: But my kid loves it and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than expected. But my kid loves it and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality it amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, stylish and comfy!!! Definitely don’t regret this purchase!!! Quality it amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy but,
customer_reviews.text: When this product arrived the box was destroyed and ripped apart
customer_reviews.author: Doglover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and it’s exactly the same as shown. But shipping took a long time .
customer_reviews.author: Neda

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality
customer_reviews.text: The chair was very small, and low to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey bunnell

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to "put together"
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved about 15 min ago, so here's my review. Box was half open when it arrived, nothing was damaged nor stained which is what was my first worry. Extremely easy to "put together".. I wouldn't say it for older kids.. maybe ages 2/5 tops? My 2yr old toddler is taller then this lol. But, it's cute and will work as a little corner for sitting. The color isn't gold though.. it's more of a mustard gold color if that makes sense... pictures added. I do think it's overpriced though.
customer_reviews.author: Olia Neborak

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this purchase at all
customer_reviews.text: Really overpriced for what you get. Ours came damaged. Not happy with this purchase at all. Had this sent to my daughter for her dorm. Major let down.
customer_reviews.author: McGadek

product_meta.title: Urban Shop Faux Fur Saucer Chair with Metal Frame, One Size, White
product_meta.description: Color:White, "White/GoldBrighten the décor of any room with the Urban Shop micro Mink saucer chair with gold frame. Part of the Urban Shop collection, the chair easily pairs with the different furniture and accent pieces in this collection. The chair folds for easy storage when not in use. The soft and plush micro Mink fabrication is 100% polyester and is spot clean only. The durable metal frame is tinted a matte gold to add to the uniqueness of the chair. 225 lb weight capacity. Dimensions: 29'' h x 32'' W x 22'' d.
feature_bullets: 100% micro mink fabrication with durable metal frame
Opens and folds in seconds for easy storage - No assembly required
Dimensions: 29'' H x 32'' W x 22'' D
Weight Capacity is 225 lbs and fits most young adults and adults. Chair easily folds up and can be stored without taking up much space when not in use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars334 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
